## DateApi interface

Date api abstraction, used for obtaining DateApi wrapper object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateApi<TDate = any> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getFormat(pseudoFormat)](./datetime.dateapi.getformat.md) | Gets format string using pseudo format |
|  [getValue(value, format)](./datetime.dateapi.getvalue.md) | Gets wrapping object used for manipulation |
|  [now()](./datetime.dateapi.now.md) | Gets wrapping object used for manipulation instantiated to current date and time |
|  [weekdaysShort()](./datetime.dateapi.weekdaysshort.md) | Gets array of weekday names in short format, order of days is dependent on locale |
|  [weekStartsOnMonday()](./datetime.dateapi.weekstartsonmonday.md) | Gets information |
